text: John Downing Fripp (February 11, 1921 â€“ March 24, 2022) was a Canadian skier and football player. He was a skier between 1927 and 1960 and played football in the Interprovincial Rugby Football Union (IRFU) (now CFL East Division) and Ontario Rugby Football Union (ORFU) between 1941 and 1947. Fripp died on March 24, 2022 in Ottawa, Ontario at the age of 101. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Canadian centenarians Category:Canadian military personnel of World War II Category:Canadian skiers Category:Ottawa Rough Riders players Category:Sportspeople from Ottawa
title: Johnny Fripp
